sect1.title: mailto

row.entry: the text to display, default is the e-mail address
How to encode the e-mail. Can be one of none, hex or javascript.
e-mail addresses to carbon copy. Separate entries by a comma.
e-mail addresses to blind carbon copy. Separate entries by a comma.
newsgroups to post to. Separate entries by a comma.
addresses to follow up to. Separate entries by a comma.
any extra information you want passed to the link, such as style sheet classes

sect1.para: mailto automates the creation of mailto links and optionally encodes them. Encoding e-mails makes it more difficult for web spiders to pick up e-mail addresses off of your site.

note.title: Technical Note
note.para: javascript is probably the most thorough form of encoding, although you can use hex encoding too.
